answers: Petit Jury is aÂ term that is used to describe the ordinary and common jury that will try most civil and criminal cases.Petit jurors who sit on a criminal trial decide guilt or innocence in a criminal matter. Petit jurors who sit on a civil trial decide liability or damages.
